Mootly Obviate is a virtual person, a nom de plum [sic], a concept, an idea, a fiction, and thanks to the vagaries of United States law regarding issues of personhood, a perfectly legal fiction. Thatâ€™s a joke.

Mootly is also a person in Second Life, where she got her start as a virtual person and where you can stop by and visit her.

Can also be found posting at @MootlyObviate@hachyderm.io because I got carried away setting up accounts one day.
